_comment: Available types: generic, backend, frontend, mobile, infra-as-code, libraries

react.description: React core library - the foundation of the React ecosystem

react-router.description: Declarative routing for React (depends on React)

redux-toolkit.description: Official Redux toolset (commonly used with React)

zustand.description: Lightweight state management for React (alternative to Redux)

pinia.description: Vue state management (depends on Vue, official replacement for Vuex)

swr.description: React data fetching library (commonly used with Next.js)

ai.description: Vercel AI SDK for building AI-powered apps (integrates with Next.js)

vite.description: Next-gen frontend build tool (uses esbuild and Rollup internally)

rollup.description: ES module bundler (Vite uses this for production builds)

express.description: Classic Node.js web framework - industry standard

trpc.description: End-to-end typesafe APIs (commonly used with Next.js + Prisma)

prisma.description: Type-safe database toolkit and ORM for Node.js

drizzle-orm.description: TypeScript ORM (alternative to Prisma, lighter weight)

vitest.description: Vite-native testing framework (mirrors Jest API, integrates with Vite)

expo.description: React Native framework and platform (depends on React)

langchainjs.description: LangChain for JavaScript - LLM application framework
